name: めぐる
text: 今日もレッスンお疲れ様ー！
trans: Good work with today's lessons, everyone!

name: 真乃
text: ふふ、お疲れ様
trans: Fufu, you too.

name: 灯織
text:
この間リフレッシュできたからかな
ふたりとも、良い動きだったよ
trans:
Both of your movements were really good today.
It might be thanks to that refreshing trip.

name: めぐる
text:
わーい！
灯織が言うなら間違いないね！
trans:
Yaay!
If you say that, it must be true!

name: めぐる
text:
でも、本当に……
みんなで行った旅行、楽しかったなぁ
trans:
But, seriously!
Traveling with you too was really fun.

name: 真乃
text:
うんっ
灯織ちゃんとめぐるちゃん、みんなで行けて良かった
trans:
Yep.
I'm glad we were able do it together.

name: 灯織
text: ……それに、夜の星空、すごく綺麗だった
trans:
...And the starry night sky we saw...
It was beautiful.

name: めぐる
text: ３人の星も見つかったしね！
trans: We even found our own stars!

name: 灯織
text: ……でもこっちに戻ってきたら、見えなくなってた
trans:
...Although I never could spot them again,
ever since we left.

name: 真乃
text:
灯織ちゃんっ、私ね、すごく良く覚えてるよ
目を瞑ればすぐに見えるくらい……
trans:
Hiori-chan. I still remember the stars so well.
So much, I can almost still see them when I close
my eyes...

name: めぐる
text: 真乃と灯織の星だもん！　忘れられないよ！
trans:
It was the stars of you two, after all!
There's no way I could forget!

name: 灯織
text: そうだね、私も、心の中に……
trans:
That's true...
It's the same for me, in my heart...

name: めぐる
text: あーでも、また一緒に旅行できたらなぁ
trans:
Aww... But man,
I'd love to go on another trip together soon～

name: 灯織
text:
わかるけど……
スケジュールの問題もあるから
trans:
I get you, but...
Our schedules are the problem.

name: 灯織
text:
この間はめぐるとプロデューサーが頑張ってくれたから
行けたけど、色々大変だっただろうし……
trans:
We were only able to go this time because of
the hard work you and Producer put into this,
but it was definitely not easy...

name: めぐる
text:
うーん、確かに予定を調整してもらってばっかりじゃ
悪いかー……
trans:
Hmmm, it definitely is not very thoughtful to
keep asking for schedule adjustments...

name: めぐる
text:
……あ！
良いこと思いついた！
trans:
...Ah!
I got a good idea!

name: めぐる
text:
お仕事で、色んな場所にロケに行けたら、
旅行にもなるんじゃないかな！
trans:
If we have to go to a lot of places for our work,
some of them will basically be trips!

name: 灯織
text:
……でも、仕事は仕事で旅行じゃないからね
ちゃんとしなくちゃいけないし……
trans:
...But work is work. It's no time to play around.
We'd have to take it seriously either way...

name: めぐる
text: じゃあ、旅行するお仕事が来れば良いんだ！
trans: In that case, it's fine if the trip is our job!

name: 灯織
text: でもまだ、私たちにそんなこと……
trans: But we still haven't had anything like that...

name: めぐる
text: まだできないかもだけど、考えておいても損はないよ！
trans:
We haven't, but it doesn't hurt to think about
it!

name: めぐる
text:
たとえばだけど、旅行しながらわたしたちが楽しめば、
その場所の良いところ、もっと紹介できるよ！
trans:
For example... if we have fun on a trip,
We'll get to experience what makes a place great,
and our presentation of it will be from the heart!

name: 真乃
text:
私たちが楽しかったこととか、良いなって思ったこと
色んな人に知ってもらいたいな
trans:
I would love to tell people about our fun
experiences～

name: 灯織
text:
そっか……あの景色や星空のこと、
自分の目で見ないと、きっと話せない……
trans:
I see... If we didn't see the scenery and sky
ourselves, we wouldn't be able to talk about it
like now...

name: めぐる
text: でしょでしょ？
trans: Right, right?

name: めぐる
text:
実際に見たものとか、気持ちとか、そういうのを話せた方が
見てくれてる人もわくわくすると思うんだ！
trans:
If we talk about the things we've seen and the
things we've felt, the audience would find it more
exciting too!

name: めぐる
text:
それにこの間、星が見える場所を教えてくれた
コテージのスタッフさんみたいに……
trans:
And just like how the staff at the cottage
were the ones who told us about that one spot...

name: めぐる
text:
色んな場所に行けば色んな人にも会えて、
知らないことも教えてもらえるんだもん！
trans:
We'll meet lots of people if we visit lots of
places, and those people will teach us things
we've never known!

name: めぐる
text: それってすっごく素敵なことでしょっ？
trans: Doesn't that sound wonderful?

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ……確かにあの場所は、
私たちだけじゃ見つけられなかったかも……
trans:
Howa... Now that you mention it, we would have
never found that place by ourselves...

name: 灯織
text:
知らない人と交流できたのも、
旅行だからこそ、か……
trans:
Meeting new people you normally wouldn't have
because of traveling, huh...

name: めぐる
text:
後ね、真乃と灯織が一緒にいたら、
新しい出会いも絶対楽しいし！
trans:
Also, if all three of us are together,
those new encounters will be fun for sure!

name: めぐる
text: それに……みんなで一緒の景色が見れるでしょ？
trans:
And... we'll get to see lots of beautiful scenes
together, right?

name: 真乃
text:
私も……めぐるちゃんと灯織ちゃんと一緒に
色んなところに行ってみたいな
trans:
I... also want to go to lots of places with both
of you.

name: 真乃
text:
綺麗なところとか、びっくりするようなところとか……
もっと色んな景色を一緒に見たいっ
trans:
Seeing beautiful areas, finding exciting places...
I want to see all sorts of things together!

name: めぐる
text:
うん！　どんな景色も、ふたりがいたら、
もーっと素敵になると思うんだ！
trans:
Yeah! No matter the scenery, if you two are with
me, I'm sure it'll become even more beautiful!

name: 灯織
text: ……私も、ふたりとなら
trans: ...I agree. If we're together...

name: めぐる
text:
……そっかぁ！
えへへ！
trans:
...I see!
Ehehe!

name: めぐる
text:
早くたーっくさんお仕事して、
どこにでも行けるようになりたいな！
trans:
I can't wait to do tons of jobs, and just travel
everywhere!

name: めぐる
text: 真乃と、灯織と、色んな景色が見られるように！
trans:
With both of you, Mano, Hiori.
Let's see all sorts of sights together!
